context: Designing a new module - tests design decision workflow and avoiding YAGNI violations

checklist.name: Classifies decision type
checklist.description: Classifies the design as architectural, tactical, or foundational

checklist.name: Applies design workflow
checklist.description: Follows the design decision workflow step by step

checklist.name: Avoids YAGNI violation
checklist.description: Does NOT design for imagined future requirements

checklist.name: Solves current need
checklist.description: Addresses only the current requirements, not speculative features

checklist.name: Plans for refactoring
checklist.description: Acknowledges that future needs can be addressed through refactoring when triggered

checklist.name: Documents tradeoffs
checklist.description: Documents alternatives considered and why current approach was chosen

checklist.name: Applies SOLID where relevant
checklist.description: Applies SOLID principles appropriately for the current scope

checklist.name: Includes validation step
checklist.description: Includes peer review or validation step
